title: [Grawood Farmstead, Meadow]
description: Green grass and tiny flowers in a myriad of hues line the well-worn path that leads away from town proper.  Ruts from wagon wheels bite deeply into the ground, and the grass between the trenches has turned brown from the abuse.  A wide-brimmed straw hat hangs from one of the fence posts bordering the path, a dusty blue ribbon tied into bow adorning it.
room.location: Grawood Farmstead outside of River's Rest
